DOC.brief_title: Study Effect Inulin Infant Formula Gut Health
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion screen : Healthy infant 34 month ( 91120 day birth ) age day 1 study , healthy growth determine base WHO standard Fully formulafed 28 day prior inclusion Expected investigational product intake min 500ml per day Written inform consent parent Exclusion criterion screen : Low birth weight ( LBW ) less 2,000g . Disorders require special diet ( food intolerance food allergy complaint reflux , constipation cramp special toddler formula require ) Use systemic antibiotic antimycotic medication 14 day prior study Significant congenital abnormality interfere study objective opinion investigator . Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability parent comply protocol requirement . Participation study involve investigational market product concomitantly within two week prior entry study . Exclusion criterion intervention period : Not consume study product longer 2 day consecutively Intake study product le 500ml per day 7 day
